name: places/ChIJ4bLqt5xYwokR5g37mm5T_Us
formattedAddress: 618 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 618 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text:
Atmosphere Kitchen & Bath (designers) and ACNY (contractors) designed and (re)built my two bathrooms.  I was extremely pleased with both the process and the results. Suzanne (the head designer) had ideas that helped me get exactly what I wanted, even when I didn't know exactly what it was at the beginning. Bill (the head contractor) also had ideas that vastly improved the original plans, such as using pocket (sliding) doors in order to give the small bathrooms the feeling of a lot more space as well as make them more accessible.  The workmen were courteous not only to me but to my neighbors, who were favorably impressed with their cleanliness and thoughtfulness.  I admired their craftsmanship and attention to detail.

You get what you pay for; the final cost was quite a bit more than I had hoped for, but both the materials and the workmanship were outstanding. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend both Atmosphere and ACNY to anyone seeking to do a remodel.

originalText.text: Sienna was extremely helpful and professional.  She was sensitive to our time constraints.  The people who came with the cabinet worked to make sure everything lined up perfectly and cleaned up well.  We were very pleased with the entire process.

text.text: Sienna was extremely helpful and professional.  She was sensitive to our time constraints.  The people who came with the cabinet worked to make sure everything lined up perfectly and cleaned up well.  We were very pleased with the entire process.

originalText.text: The crew at Atmosphere is simply the best.  Suzanne and Billy Cook are the dynamic duo.  From architectural planning to design to execution, we were in excellent hands the entire time.  They are honest about where to allocate resources and where to save, and they listen to their clients.  Billy’s construction knowledge is brilliant, and Suzanne’s design sense - while keeping functionality a priority - is stellar.  They are available all the time should any issues arise, and no problem is insurmountable for them.  I can’t wait for my next project so I can work with them again.

text.text: The crew at Atmosphere is simply the best.  Suzanne and Billy Cook are the dynamic duo.  From architectural planning to design to execution, we were in excellent hands the entire time.  They are honest about where to allocate resources and where to save, and they listen to their clients.  Billy’s construction knowledge is brilliant, and Suzanne’s design sense - while keeping functionality a priority - is stellar.  They are available all the time should any issues arise, and no problem is insurmountable for them.  I can’t wait for my next project so I can work with them again.

originalText.text: Working with Suzanne and Atmosphere was fantastic. Despite having many projects underway, Suzanne was always available (and clearly loved) the design process. She was patient and super-responsive in dealing with all the little details that came up. She and her crew incorporated a TON of functionality into our tiny kitchen, and came up with a beautiful, compact design for our small bathroom. She really looked at each project both from a livability perspective (how would we use it everyday) as well as from an aesthetic design perspective. We would be thrilled to work with her again in the future but for now will be enjoying our beautiful spaces!

originalText.text: Atmosphere does top notch work and they approach all projects with wisdom, experience and creativity.  I was thrilled with the work they did.
